title: ‘Foxy at 40' Foxhills Club & Resort celebratory offer
text:
‘Foxy at 40' Foxhills Club & Resort celebratory offer ‘Foxy at 40' Foxhills Club & Resort celebratory offer Details   11:30 40 rooms at £40 per night, first 40 callers will secure special price stay 1-30 November 2015 To mark its 40th anniversary, family-owned Foxhills Club & Resort in Surrey will offer 40 of its guest rooms for just £40 per night, on stays between 1 and 30 November 2015. The resort hotline - 01932 704500 - opens at 10.30am on Tuesday 13 October and the special prices will be allocated to the first 40 callers to quote FOXY40. 
Guests at Foxhills in November may wish to prepare for the festive season at one of the popular winter markets at nearby Guilford Cathedral or The Losely House Christmas Fair, which features crafts and gifts from over sixty local businesses. Top off a Yuletide shopping break in style with the switching on of Woking’s Christmas lights on 19 November. The Woking Beer Festival on 6-7 November offers ales from far and wide, whilst the Taste of Wisley Harvest Festival runs throughout the month and features tasty food and glorious garden-related festivities. Foxhills is only five minutes from J11 of the M25, and the picturesque 400-acre four-star Surrey estate is open to Members and visitors. Guests taking advantage of this room-only offer may upgrade to include breakfast from £14 per person. All guests at Foxhills enjoy access to the grounds including the off-road 2km fitness jogging trail, tennis courts, 9 hole Manor golf course and healthspa. Those wanting to secure a room for £40 should quote FOXY40 when calling to reserve. Related articles
